Sentencas: Electrophoretic deposition (EPD) was carried out on nickel metal sheets using acetone and ethanol mixtures.
Titulo: A study on the electrophoretic deposition of 8YSZ coating using mixture of acetone and ethanol solvents

Sentencas: The ratios of the organic solvents in the suspension was varied to arrive at the optimum ratio of solvents and experimental conditions suitable for getting adherent and crack-ftee yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) coatings.
Titulo: A study on the electrophoretic deposition of 8YSZ coating using mixture of acetone and ethanol solvents

Sentencas: The volume ratios of acetone to ethanol used in the present study were 100:OmL (4A:0E), 75:25 mL(3A:1 E), 50:50 mL (2A:2E), 25:75 mL (1A:3E) and 0:100 mL (0A:4E).
Titulo: A study on the electrophoretic deposition of 8YSZ coating using mixture of acetone and ethanol solvents

Sentencas: Iodine was used as an additive to charge the YSZ particles.
Titulo: A study on the electrophoretic deposition of 8YSZ coating using mixture of acetone and ethanol solvents

Sentencas: The applied dc voltage was varied from 10 to 40Vcm(-1) and also the deposition time was varied 4, 6 and 8 min.
Titulo: A study on the electrophoretic deposition of 8YSZ coating using mixture of acetone and ethanol solvents

Sentencas: The effect of applied dc voltage during EPD on the weight of the deposit and in turn on the thickness of the coating obtained was studied.
Titulo: A study on the electrophoretic deposition of 8YSZ coating using mixture of acetone and ethanol solvents

Sentencas: The YSZ deposits were viewed under a metallurgical microscope to determine the presence of cracks or other defects in the as deposited coatings after initial drying.
Titulo: A study on the electrophoretic deposition of 8YSZ coating using mixture of acetone and ethanol solvents

Sentencas: Attempts were made to understand the observed behavior of different solvent ratios with the number of protons released.
Titulo: A study on the electrophoretic deposition of 8YSZ coating using mixture of acetone and ethanol solvents

Sentencas: This study facilitated to arrive at the optimum solvent ratio (3A: 1 E and 2A:2E) and the experimental conditions required for getting smooth, homogeneous, crack-free YSZ coatings by EPD on nickel substrates.
Titulo: A study on the electrophoretic deposition of 8YSZ coating using mixture of acetone and ethanol solvents

Sentencas: Using the optimized condition of 2A:2E, lanthanum-doped strontium manganite (LSM) tube which acts as cathode in tubular solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) was coated with 8YSZ using EPD.
Titulo: A study on the electrophoretic deposition of 8YSZ coating using mixture of acetone and ethanol solvents

Sentencas: The electrophoretically coated YSZ coating on sintering showed a dense microstructure.
Titulo: A study on the electrophoretic deposition of 8YSZ coating using mixture of acetone and ethanol solvents
